title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and server that lets you pull, build and run large language models locally (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) with a simple API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models from any Python script or notebook.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same generate/chat/embed API surface as the Python library.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package providing Ollama LLM, embedder and retriever components for building RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama—chat with any local model, import/export chats, multi-user, dark/light themes, runs in Docker.

title: ollama-cli (go-skynet/ollama-cli)
summary: TUI wrapper written in Go that adds interactive prompt history, syntax highlighting and conversation management to the ollama CLI.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot chat requests to a local Ollama model, enabling fully offline AI pair-programming.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and WebUI onto Kubernetes clusters with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library (Kotlin friendly) exposing synchronous, reactive and streaming APIs for Ollama endpoints.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST API; supports chat, generate, embeddings, model listing and pulling with built-in retries.

title: ollama-chatbot (nlpodyssey/ollama-chatbot)
summary: Minimal Python chatbot template using Streamlit; demonstrates session memory, token streaming and model switching via Ollama.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-run Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama server, WebUI, Redis memory store and nginx HTTPS proxy.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds “Ask Ollama” command to summarize notes, brainstorm ideas or rewrite text using a local model.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama supporting .NET 6+; offers async enumerable streaming and strongly-typed request/response models.

title: ollama-rag (huggingface/ollama-rag)
summary: Reference implementation of retrieval-augmented generation combining Ollama LLM with Hugging Face embeddings and Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin to run local LLM prompts on block selections and inject results back into your knowledge graph.

title: ollama-npm (npm package)
summary: Official Ollama JavaScript SDK published on npm; identical feature set to the github.com/ollama/ollama-js repo.

title: ollama (PyPI package)
summary: Official Python SDK distributed on PyPI; install via pip and talk to Ollama server in one line of code.

title: r/ollama - Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for discussing Ollama releases, model recommendations, troubleshooting and showcasing community projects.

title: Ollama on Hacker News
summary: Discussion thread around Ollama v0.1.37 release highlighting new OpenAI-compatible endpoint and performance improvements.
